## Quarto

Stuff

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(flextable)
```

## Table now

```{r, results='asis'}
#| echo: false
ftrmd <- tribble(
  ~`FTE Assigned To`,    ~FTE,   ~`Hours per Week`,   ~`Example Sentence`,
  "Finance team",        0.40,   16,                  "Lydia's FTE assigned to finance is 0.40.",
  "Alma",                0.60,   24,                  "Lydia's Alma-assigned FTE is 0.60"
) %>% flextable() %>% 
  add_body_row(
    top = FALSE,
    list(
      `FTE Assigned To` = "Crown Institute",
      FTE = 1.0,
      `Hours per Week` = 40,
      `Example Sentence` = "Lydia's FTE at Crown is 1.0."
    )
  ) %>% flextable_to_rmd()

print(ftrmd)
```
